title: "Robotic Gradient Wallpapers"
content: Robotic Gradient Wallpapers is a website that offers a collection of stunning wallpapers featuring simple graphic designs of robotic arms against gradient backgrounds of complementary colors. Our wallpapers are perfect for anyone who loves robots, technology, and minimalist design. With our wide selection of colors and designs, you're sure to find the perfect wallpaper to enhance your desktop or mobile device. All of our wallpapers are high-quality and free to download, so why not add some futuristic flair to your screen today?

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a robot arm, against a gradient background of two complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
